dict.string: The Sahoo bakery had 445 bags of sugar. Then an employee used 38 bags of sugar to make some carrot cake. How much sugar is left?
A treasure hunter discovered a buried treasure chest filled with a total of 831 gems. 51 of the gems were diamonds, and the rest were rubies. How many of the gems were rubies?

Susan and Collin jumped on the couch a combined total of 157 times. Then the couch broke, and they both got in big trouble. If Susan jumped on the couch 36 times, how many times did Collin jump on it?
There were a total of 385 books sitting on a bookcase in Leslie's bedroom, until she sold 75 of them. How many books are left on the bookcase?
The teacher bought a sticker for each of her students. There are 30 students in her class. If she gave 15 away, how many does she have left?
A large company is hosting a conference. So far, a total of 306 people have signed up, including 88 from the United States. How many people from other countries have signed up?
There were 5 dozens cookies in the pantry. Patrick's aunt ate 9 cookies and Patrick ate 6. How many cookies are left?
On an island, there are a total of 233 horses. There are 26 tame horses. How many wild horses are on the island?
Since he was hired, a chef has served a total of 815 guests. Of those guests, 80 were children. How many adults has the chef served?
Tim went to the market with $20. He spent $7 on vegetables and took a cab back home. He had $8 left after paying the cab fare. What was the cab fare?
